title: Player Behaviour FAQ
body: RIOT, u need 2 put in a appeal system, Ive been put in the "lower priority queue" 3 different times because I'm at 15000 ping cuz the servers fk up, or when the game crashes and i cant open it again till I restart the computer, and by then the game has usually finished. I'm sick of it, put in an appeal system so we can say why we left the game, and if its unfair u can revoke it.

replies.body: "Yeah I left this game because my internet and PC are trash as fuck and I cannot afford a SSD so it takes 20 minutes for my toaste- PC to boot, please unban" - OP.

how many fkin times do i need to tell you people its not my computer. My internet is great and the only bug my computer had was i couldnt open the launcher, but I've ling since fixed that, so please stop blaming my computer and hating on me. seriously.

now its done it again, i tried to reconnect but i got a blank screen, I alt-tabbed and closed it, now ive got a LOL sign in the middle of the screen that will stay there till i restart, and i cant open league either.
Thats not my computer

when its my computer that laggs it only goes to 1199 ping not 15000, and how is the game crashing my computers fault. its not the bug splat crash it just says attempting to reconnect then crashes, then the launcher wont start untill I restart. And my internet is fine, we previously had a dodgy router but our new one deoent lag at all. Even so they still need an appeal system, some stuff is just unfair.

the 15k ping issue is most likely on your end, unless everyone suffers that same issue. your computer crashing is also on your end. they would appeal your ban if you had a legitimate argument, but seeing as both of those reason are your problems, you don't. and it sound like it happens a bit.
